message.content: {"id": "50793", "title": "Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "description": "Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "OB": "When a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC.", "EB": "The DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be ASYNC instead of REQUEST when a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked.", "SR": "Ensure that the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is ASYNC instead of REQUEST when a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch()."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
